Discuss the pros and cons of the Indian Government’s action plan for demonetization of Rs. 1,000 and Rs. 500 currency notes. What would be the long term impact of this step on terror financing and creation of unaccounted wealth?
Modi as implemented and taken a good step  forward inorder to overcome blackmoney.It is actually a good step hye have implemented,black money as become an major issue in not only our country bt also all o0ver the world . Because rich is becoming more rich and the poor is becoming more poor.

i appreicate modi decision and i respect it.

i know it is difficult for poor people and and old people who do not have bank accounts also government have to look after that.And government should see to that  every one should be aware of why this actually modi as taken this decision , because people coming poor background could not know the reason behind his decision .

and also one take necessary steps that old people cannot cannot stand in que for much long time , and it is qiut different for the people who earn their living in daily bais because they earn for day they can eat for the day.THese the major promblems thats it other then that it is actually aa good idea.

And demonetization of rs.500 and 1000 serioulsy a good thing all the black money is coming out from thje pockets of wrong people as well as corrupted people .

And the people who planned marriages in this month or period it will cause graet difficult to them, because bank z allowing only 10000 rs per day and in a week 20000 overall.It would be great difficult to them.

but thje good thing they have done is hosipitals to accepting the old notes because its the life of the person.

we all should respect and the rules of our Modi sir`s good idelogy it is for our good country.

and the people who are RICHER BECOMING MORE RICHER AND POOR ARE BECOMING STILL POOR.

In some year we can see our country a corruptionless and  pride less country.

People eat for what they earn. I m very happy and proud of modi drastic decision which will improve the life of commen people and poor people.

 And government should see to that each and every person should be aware of benifits of this drastic decision and move.

 I obey and repect for my world good going. 

i encourage our government to come out of this kind of drastic changes and quick decisions inoder to develop the our nation .

Everyone should join the hands for the growth of our democratic country. One cannot alone make the change in the development of our country each and everyone should contribute there best to the country.

 our country is still an developing country i hope the changes like this and steps decisions like this make our country a developing country to the developed country.

So let us hope for our countries good going.

 

 


File Name:Smart Elevator Market

In todays era smart elevators in market grow very faster. Now a days elevators had become very important for big shopping malls and the big buildings.

the market experienced the high grow of morden smart elevators and the demand for it also raised rapidly ,China alone approximately as 53% of the upcoming high rise projects around the world . The rising njumber of buildings has escalated the demand for the elevators for the comfortable,efficient, and secure vertical transportation system.

the morden elevators systems is more developed in countries such as U.S ,Canada ,china ,and France has been major contribution to smart elevators.

 the revenue contributed for mordern elevators is 52% of over all smart elevators market revenue. technology is been advanced with new features and facilities for the secure transport of the people and cater to the custom needs. 

In 2014 the urban population accounted for 54% of the world population as compared to 34% in 1960.and the estimated of thwr world population would be 1.8% growth in the population every year an dit eventually tiggers the demand for more efficient smart elevators.


so many of the global vendors are currently shiffing their focus on smart elevators because its demand in the market is so high an ddemand for it also increasing day by day.

Anmd the Thyssenkrupp, which maintain 1.1 million of elevators integrated cloud  capabilities to its systems inoeder to gather data and improve the maintainence of service. 

commercial application to beef up the smart elevator market growth

  The commerial application of smart elevators would boon the growth of the over all in the market.

the smart elevators are used in many offices,hotels,lodgings,heathcare hospitals etc in many places the elevators are been used so that is the reason demand for the elevators in market also raised so high. The demand and the capacity of each elevator may not same it differs from place to place according to ones need and wish ,residencial buildings have lesser inter floor traffic as compared to to commerial buildings. 

so therefore the capacity of the elevators also differs. And the healthcare and the hospitals require deeper elevators to take streatchers so the capacity of the elevator should be high.

And in malls and the multiplexs they need vandal proof material of elevator is reqired. and these elevators consume large amount of energy in the large commerical buildings so that the gaint players in the market innovate new technology and ideas for smart elevators. 

In 2011 Mitsubishi has developed a multi elevator smart technolgy that reduces the energy consumption up to 10%, so that it focus on operational efficiency during peak hours. Therefore the demand for the elevators grows higher day by day.


#################--Don`t Delete below content#################

Smart Elevator Market

The global smart elevator market is expected to grow significantly. Driven by modernization of existing elevator systems, the market is expected to experience a radical shift by 2020. With a considerable number of new deployment anticipated in developing Asian countries, the deployments of smart elevators could potentially takeover modernization revenue by 2020. China alone accounts for roughly 53 percent of the upcoming high-rise projects around the world.

Globally, the rising number of high-rise buildings has escalated the demand for a fast, comfortable, efficient, and secure vertical transportation system. In addition, worldwide green infrastructure standards and statutory requirements are instrumental in compelling deployment of smart elevators in new structures and current infrastructures.

The modernization of conventional elevator systems in developed countries such as U.S., UK, Canada, and France has been a major contributor to smart elevator market revenue so far. However, over the period, upcoming high-rise buildings would adopt fresh deployment of smart elevator systems. As a result, new deployment of smart elevators would surpass the modernization segment revenue and contribute more than 52% of the overall smart elevators market revenue.

Technologically advanced features and integration of intelligent communication, access control and security technology enables smart elevators to cater to the custom needs of various end-use segments such as residential, commercial, healthcare, industrial and hospitality among many others. Smart elevators can be customized to the unique requirements of each of these end-user segments and can provide excellent reliability, hygiene, aesthetics, ride and destination control, space, and comfort.

There is a significant change in the number of people residing in cities. In 2014, the urban population accounted for 54 percent of the total world population as compared to 34 percent in 1960. The estimates suggest that the shift would level during 2015 – 2020 and cities across the world would see 1.8% growth in population every year. The limitation of geographical expansion of cities would result in vertical growth, and a greater number of high-rise projects shall be commissioned, which will eventually trigger the demand for more efficient smart elevators.

Global vendors of vertical transportation systems are currently shifting their focus to smart elevators to remain competitive. ThyssenKrupp, which maintains and manages more than 1.1 million elevators, has now integrated cloud capabilities to its systems in order to gather valuable data about systems and sensors as well as improve its maintenance service. In 2014, Schindler Elevator Corporation successfully completed the installation and modernization of its PORT elevator technology at the Union Plaza office building, Puerto Rico. The Hearst Tower and the Bank of America in Manhattan, the Humana headquarters in Louisville and the Crescent in Dallas are some of the buildings where Schindler Corporation has installed its smart elevator destination dispatch technology system.

 

Commercial application to beef up the smart elevator market growth

The commercial application of the smart elevators market would prove a boon for the growth of the overall market.

The commercial applications where smart elevators are being used are offices, hotel & lodgings, healthcare, financial institutions and retail (malls and multiplexes). The design and capacity of the elevators differs in all the sectors. i.e., residential buildings have lesser inter floor traffic as compared to commercial buildings; therefore, the capacity and the passenger capacity varies; whereas, in healthcare sector, hospitals require deeper elevators to take stretchers. In malls and multiplexes, vandal proof material of smart elevator is required. In addition to this, spacious and ride comfort elevators are essential in retail and warehouses. Therefore, the elevators are designed according to the purpose of the elevator.

Elevators consume large amount of energy in large commercial buildings where there is more inter-floor traffic of people. Therefore, giant players in the market are innovating solutions that would consume less power and provide same customer experience, i.e. Smart Elevators.

For instance, Mitsubishi has developed a multi-elevator smart technology in 2011 that reduces energy consumption approximately up to 10%. The smart technology focuses on operational efficiency during peak hours of rush and on the other hand maximizes energy reduction during lull times.
